previous.title: The housing boom continues with US Home Prices hitting all-time highs again, up 8% over the past year. https://t.co/PmsgrlG6TJ

localize.full_text: 房地产热潮仍在继续，美国房价再次创下历史新高，在过去一年里上涨了8%。https://t.co/PmsgrlG6TJ

next.excerpt: Feenancy is a pack of custom 3D icons suitable for any fintech product. Create stunning, unique projects with these hand crafted icons, easily editable in Figma, and fully customizable in Cinema 4D. 3D icons rock!
next.title: Feenancy 3D icons - 35 trendy customizable 3D icons  for any fintech product

localize.description: Feenancy是一套定制的3D图标，适用于任何金融科技产品。用这些手工制作的图标创建令人惊叹的、独特的项目，在Figma中可以轻松编辑，在Cinema 4D中可以完全自定义。3D图标摇滚乐！
localize.tagline: 35个时髦的可定制3D图标 ，适用于任何金融科技产品

localize.description: Feenancy是一套定製的3D圖標，適用於任何金融科技產品。用這些手工製作的圖標創建令人驚歎的、獨特的項目，在Figma中可以輕鬆編輯，在Cinema 4D中可以完全自定義。3D圖標搖滾樂！
localize.tagline: 35個時髦的可定製3D圖標 ，適用於任何金融科技產品
